law.catch_line: Guidelines for use of procurement to support agricultural economy -- Changes to administrative regulations and policies.
law.text: By January 1, 2003, the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall issue guidelines to the various agencies identified by the Commissioner of Agriculture in KRS 260.035 directing the manner in which those agencies shall employ the stateâ€™s procurement process to support and encourage the growth of Kentucky's agricultural economy. Notwithstanding the provisions of KRS Chapter 45A, the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall make necessary changes to administrative regulations and cabinet policy in accordance with this section and KRS 45A.035, 45A.095, 45A.645, and 260.035.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002.
